house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 2000 has 5 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage and approximately 4000 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include fireplace, air conditioning, french doors.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, French Doors, Walk-In Closet(s)
